rows.label: tev001691_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hiya, [ST:playername ]!
I was just here watching the Skells again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0002
rows.name:
I've seen enough parked Skells to last a lifetime,
but seeing them in motion? I never get tired of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0003
rows.name:
Doesn't it just get your heart all aflutter watching them
zip around the Outfitters test hangar?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_JNK0010
rows.name: Disdain

rows.label: tev001691_SEL0011
rows.name:
Roll your eyes and ask Alexa if she
ever does anything else with her time.

rows.label: tev001691_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev001691_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Alexa if this is how she spends her days off.

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0004
rows.name: Anything...else?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0005
rows.name: Well, sure! I do Skell maintenance and stuff like that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0006
rows.name:
After this, I was planning to go consult with some of
the Skell pilots in other divisions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0007
rows.name:
Heh, you must think I'm some sort of deranged
Skell fanatic, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0008
rows.name:
On my days off, I go to church. Then shopping.
Then maybe visit a friend's house for dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0009
rows.name: That's pretty normal, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0010
rows.name:
Okay, sure, I also stop by the hangars on my way
home so I can watch the mechanics service Skells.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0011
rows.name:
Heh, you must think I'm some sort of deranged
Skell fanatic, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001691_SEL0031
rows.name: Nod your head violently.

rows.label: tev001691_JNK0040
rows.name: Reassure

rows.label: tev001691_SEL0041
rows.name: Say there's nothing wrong with having a passion.

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0012
rows.name: Ouch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0013
rows.name:
You nodded so quickly, I was afraid I'd given you
whiplash.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0014
rows.name:
But Daddy always used to tell me that no matter what
I did, I should always try to be the best.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'll never be the most knowledgeable about Skells—
or the best pilot—but when it comes to loving them,
I think I'm number one for sure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0016
rows.name:
So I guess I'm proud to be the most deranged Skell
fanatic in New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0017
rows.name: I KNOW, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0018
rows.name:
It's important to have something that keeps you
motivated to do your job.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0019
rows.name: And when it comes to Skells, I give 200 percent![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0020
rows.name:
Admittedly, on everything not Skell-related,
I typically give around 50 percent, tops.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0021
rows.name: Hee hee! That part was just a joke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001691_MSG0022
rows.name:
I want to earn the right to be a professional Skell pilot,
so whatever mission BLADE has for me, you better
believe I'll be giving it at least 100 percent![ST:wait ]
